ygData.subject: Re: I hate to be a downer... but..
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/5/99 1:30:25 PM Eastern Standard Time, talkum_talmaich@hotmail.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/5/99 1:30:25 PM Eastern Standard Time,
talkum_talmaich@... writes:

<< I hate to be a downer... but I doubt the 50 charges to 1 charge is a bug.
Verrant has a long history of defusing ways of making easy money. >>

Nice theory but I DO believe it is a bug. You mentioned the O Staff losing
charges but that has been fixed. Now when you trade it it keeps the same
charges it had. I'm sure they will do the same for the Aqua lung. They didnt
put tinkered items in the game for only tinkerers to use. Its a TRADE skill.
Trade skill items are meant to be traded.

Gazu
